articles.description: An NCAA group working on a new model for undergraduate transfers says it is making progress, but it will not allow any proposal granting immediate eligibility for all athletes wishing to switch schools.
articles.headline: NCAA group won't allow any proposal granting immediate eligibility to all transfers

articles.description: Struggling to find that perfect last minute Valentine's Day gift? Mike Gundy, and his saxophone, have some advice for all those hopeless romantics.
articles.headline: Let Mike Gundy sax up your Valentine's Day

articles.description: This week's episode looks at a day in the life of a Princeton men's basketball student-athlete
articles.headline: Hard Cuts with Princeton Basketball: A day with Dev  - Via Ivy League

images.caption: This week's episode looks at a day in the life of a Princeton men's basketball student-athlete
images.name: Hard Cuts with Princeton Basketball: A day with Dev  - Via Ivy League

articles.description: LeBron James playfully comments on the biggest adjustment Trae Young will have to make going from collegiate to professional basketball.
articles.headline: LeBron on Trae Young: 'He better go pro'

images.caption: LeBron James playfully comments on the biggest adjustment Trae Young will have to make going from collegiate to professional basketball.
images.name: LeBron on Trae Young: 'He better go pro'

articles.description: The federal government has dropped charges against Jonathan Augustine, a former AAU basketball director from Florida, in the Adidas scandal case.
articles.headline: Feds drop charges against AAU basketball program director in Adidas scandal case

images.caption: Charges were dropped for a man accused of helping Adidas funnel money to families of high-ranked basketball recruits.
images.name: Adidas logo [600x400]

articles.description: Will Curry's incredible shooting become the new normal for more guards like the OU star? Kevin Pelton examines what Young shows about the NBA MVP's effect on future draft prospects.
articles.headline: Is Trae Young just the first of many Steph Curry clones?

images.caption: LeBron James playfully comments on the biggest adjustment Trae Young will have to make going from collegiate to professional basketball.
images.name: LeBron on Trae Young: 'He better go pro'

videos.description: Bonzie Colson finds Matt Farrell on the wing after Indiana's tough defense closed off the paint for the Fighting Irish.
videos.headline: Farrell knocks down a 3 for Notre Dame

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Farrell knocks down a 3 for Notre Dame) 2017/12/16 ESHEET

videos.description: Notre Dame's Bonzie Colson rolls into the paint and lays it in before getting fouled by Indiana in the first half.
videos.headline: Colson lays it up and picks up the foul

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Colson lays it up and picks up the foul) 2017/12/16 ESHEET

videos.description: Fighting Irish freshman D.J. Harvey can't finish on his Giannis Antetokounmpo impression against Indiana.
videos.headline: Notre Dame frosh fails at Greek Freak dunk

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Notre Dame frosh fails at Greek Freak dunk) 2017/12/16 ESHEET

videos.description: Juwan Morgan helps Indiana chip away at Notre Dame's lead with a scoring surge early in the second half.
videos.headline: Morgan's bucket punctuates Hoosiers' 9-0 run

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Morgan's bucket punctuates Hoosiers' 9-0 run) 2017/12/16 ESHEET

videos.description: Zach McRoberts practically takes the ball out of Nikola Djoko's hands during a layup attempt.
videos.headline: McRoberts throws down beautiful block

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (McRoberts throws down beautiful block) 2017/12/16 ESHEET

videos.description: The Hoosiers head to overtime with the Fighting Irish after Juwan Morgan fights off a Notre Dame defender for the tying bucket.
videos.headline: Morgan battles down low for game-tying score

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Morgan battles down low for game-tying score) 2017/12/16 ESHEET

videos.description: Juwan Morgan slams down his missed free throw and Indiana's defense shuts down Notre Dame's game-winning shot attempt to seal it for the Hoosiers.
videos.headline: Hoosiers lock down Fighting Irish in OT

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Hoosiers lock down Fighting Irish in OT) 2017/12/16 ESHEET
